name: rainbow-pass
effect: Provides access to the Sevii Islands.
short_effect: Grants access to all of the Sevii Islands.

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
For ferries serving
VERMILION and the
SEVII ISLANDS.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A pass for ferries between
VERMILION and the SEVII ISLANDS.
It features a drawing of a rainbow.
